changelog: Iconify v6.1.1 has arrived! It has the following new changes:
>> Allow force disabling to use stock battery styles
>> Allow changing Volume Panel and Media Player roundness
>> Added 10 new styles (Works only if rom has pixel default progress bar)
>> Added option to hide statusbar on lockscreen
>> Added option to use light accent in light mode
>> Added option to restart SystemUI after reboot
>> Fixed in-app colors in dark mode.
>> Roundness might break after reboot. Just re-apply to fix.
>> Re-make and flash volume panel module if it looks weird.
Also included in this version are bug fixes and other improvements.
